name: Simple
short-desc: Doubles the Pokemon's stat modifiers.  These doubled modifiers are still capped at -6 or 6 stages.
long-desc: Each stage of this Pokemon's stat modifiers acts as two stages.  These doubled stages are still limited to a minimum of -6 and a maximum of 6.  This Pokemon can still accumulate less than -3 or more than 3 stages of stat modifiers, even though the extra ones have no effect after doubling.
